titles: Three letters concerning the present state of Italy written in the year 1687 ... : being a supplement to Dr. Burnet's letters.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Relating to the affair of Molinos, and the Quietists -- Relating to the Inquisition, and the state of religion -- Relating to the policy and interests of some of the states of Italy.
keywords: Italy --  Description and travel --  Early works to 1800.
